identity.name: SmartPlate Design System
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix NGO warmth with Logistics precision.
Emotion First: Every pixel builds trust.
Content is King: Data tells a story of impact.
Zoom In: Focus on the human element (food, faces).
Negative Space: Let the mission breathe.

headings.usage: Use for all section headers, card titles, and hero text. Manrope bridges the gap between modern tech and human friendliness.

body.usage: Use for all data tables, descriptions, and inputs. Optimized for legibility at small sizes.

mono.usage: Use for tracking IDs, logistics codes, and raw data metrics.

primary.name: Forest Green
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key branding elements. Represents growth and trust.

secondary.name: Terracotta
secondary.usage: Urgent actions (Donate Now), alerts, 'Needs Attention' statuses.

background.name: Warm Bone
background.usage: Global app background. Avoids the sterility of pure white.

surface.name: Pure White
surface.usage: Cards, modals, inputs. Creates depth against the Warm Bone background.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous (2x standard). Use p-6, p-8, p-12 for containers.

marketing.rules: Asymmetry is key. Mix col-span-8 (Hero) with col-span-4 (Detail).

dashboard.rules: Fill every pixel. Use row-span-2 for tall lists. Ensure alignment.

cards.classes: bg-white rounded-xl border border-stone-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-[#1A4D2E] hover:bg-[#143d24] text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all transform hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-[#1A4D2E] text-[#1A4D2E] hover:bg-stone-50 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-stone-600 hover:text-[#1A4D2E] hover:bg-stone-100 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-all

navigation.classes: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-stone-200/50 sticky top-0 z-50

visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows (shadow-sm, shadow-md). Avoid harsh black shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: Subtle 1px borders in stone-200. Use for definition, not decoration.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-xl for cards, rounded-full for buttons, rounded-lg for inputs.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly on sticky headers and toast notifications.
visual_enhancers.gradients: NO full-screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients in hero backgrounds only.

motion.hover_effects: Lift up (-translate-y-1) on cards. Color shift on buttons.
motion.loading: Skeleton loaders with a shimmer effect (animate-pulse).

hero.usage: Main landing page hero background or side image.

community.alt: Women serving food in community kitchen

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Rounded line caps.
icons.usage: Use consistent sizing (w-5 h-5 for buttons, w-6 h-6 for nav).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for text. Use dark charcoal on warm bone.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-[#1A4D2E] on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add Manrope and JetBrains Mono via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (Forest Green, Terracotta, Warm Bone).
3. OVERRIDE SHADCN: Customize the default Shadcn components to match the 'Soft Utility' style (rounded-xl, soft shadows).
4. BUILD LAYOUTS: Use the Bento Grid system for the dashboards. Do not use simple columns.
5. USE IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for placeholders. Do not use gray boxes.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
